agency.textblock: Office of Justice Programs, Bureau of Justice Assistance, Department of Justice.

action.textblock: Public announcement of the Fiscal Year (FY) 1994 Discretionary Program Plan, enumerating grants to be awarded by the Bureau of Justice Assistance in accordance with the Anti-Drug Abuse Act of 1988.

summary.textblock: The Bureau of Justice Assistance (BJA) is publishing this notice of the FY 1994 Discretionary Program Plan for interested applicants.

date.textblock: Requests for proposals for competitive programs will be issued under a separate program announcement, with specific due dates for each program.

further.textblock: The Bureau of Justice Assistance Response Center at (202) 307-1480. (This is not a toll-free number.) To obtain the FY 1994 Discretionary Program Plan, interested applicants should call or write the Bureau of Justice Assistance Clearinghouse 1-800-688-4252 at the National Criminal Justice Reference Service (NCJRS), Box 6000, Rockville, MD 20850.

supplem.textblock: The following supplementary information is provided:
This action is authorized under sec. 6091 of the Anti-Drug Abuse Act of 1988, Public Law 100-690, 102 Stat. 4181, 4328, 42 U.S.C. 3742(2).

signjob.textblock: Acting Director, Bureau of Justice Assistance.
